attributes.additional_details:
To maintain our rights as human beings to decide what enters our bodies without being adversely discriminated against.
We protect people's rights to gender identity and religious thoughts and to do so without being victimised society nor the state.
If vaccine passports are issued this will be the first group to have no say over their own bodies without serious social and material consequences.
attributes.background: Not to discriminate against anyone that refuses the covid vaccine either in the work place, travel or where they are allowed to enter be it shops, pubs sporting or social events

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
